title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-3.6 - Welders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-3.6 - Welders

State Regulations

Preparation of welding procedure specifications and the
conducting of tests of procedures and welders shall be the responsibility of
the party undertaking repairs or alterations. Before repairs or alterations are
started, the inspector shall examine the written welding procedure and records
of qualification tests to determine if procedures and welders have been
properly qualified as required in section IX of the ASME Code. Witnessing of
the tests by the inspector is not mandatory, but the inspector shall have the
right to call for and witness the making of test coupons by any welder, at any
time, and to observe the physical testing of the coupons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-3.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
